Title: Requires the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations relating to gas flow meters at natural gas well sites
Summary: Requires the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations relating to gas flow meters at natural gas well sites.
LawCode: Amd ยง23-0305, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations relating to gas flow meters at natural gas well sites
